pageTitle: SAIL Recruitment 2014 - SAIL RSP 432 Latest Job Opportunities | www.sail.co.in
textBeforeTable: Operator-cum-Technician (Trainee) Vacancies in SAIL: 222 Rourkela Steel Plant SAIL Recruitment 2014 Details Now SAIL Rourkela Steel Plant (RSP) is recruiting 412 latest job vacancies with ITI and Diploma candidates. It published employment notification in SAIL official website www.sail.co.in and www.sailcareers.com. As per the SAIL recruitment 2014 notification for SAIL RSP online applications are invited by www.sailcareers.com for filling up 412 ACTT and OCTT job opportunities in SAIL through this SAIL Rourkela recruitment 2014. SAIL online application for current SAIL recruitment is available in website www.sailcareers.com. are considered as one of the best jobs in India. SAIL conducts recruitments through the year in it’s units SAIL Bokaro Steel Plant, SAIL Bhilai Steel Plant, SAIL Durgapur Steel Plant, SAIL IISCO Steel Plant (Burnpur), special steel plants, Ferro-Alloy Plants and other units. SAIL Career is the most awaited careers in India and SAIL job aspirants eagerly wait for SAIL recruitments. textAfterTable: Pay Scale         :   During training period Rs. 10700 is paid as stipend for 1st year & Rs. 12200 for the 2nd year. After successful completion of training they will be absorbed in Steel Authority of India Limited as Operators and Technicians in S3 Scale  Rs.16800-3%-24110/-.
